{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Comment |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Creates a comment. |long description=This template is used to create a comment with the Collaboration Extension. |parameters=
{{Comment
|CommentPerson
|CommentContent
|CommentDatetime
|CommentRelatedArticle
|CommentRating
}}
|defines category=Category:Comment }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} ''Comment for {{#if: {{{CommentRelatedArticle|}}} | [[Belongs to article::{{{CommentRelatedArticle|}}}]] | nothing}}''
{{#vardefine:userimage|{{#ask: [[{{{CommentPerson}}}]] | ?User_image = | link=none}} }}{{#if:{{#var:userimage}}| [[{{#var:userimage}}|frameless|48px]] | [[File:Defaultuser.gif|frameless|48px]] }}
{{#if: {{{CommentPerson|}}} |{{#ifexist:{{{CommentPerson}}}|[[{{{CommentPerson|}}}]]|{{{CommentPerson|}}}}}[[Has comment person::{{{CommentPerson|}}}| ]]|}}
,
{{#if: {{{CommentDatetime|}}} |
[[Has comment date::{{{CommentDatetime|}}}]]
}}{{#if:{{{CommentRating|}}}|[[Has comment rating::{{{CommentRating|}}}|]]
{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} < 2 | {{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} > -2 | Article quality rated:
{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} = -1 | [[File:Bad_active.png]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} = 0 | [[File:Neutral_active.png]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{CommentRating|}}} = 1 | [[File:Good_active.png]] }}
| }}| }}
| }}
{{#if:{{{CommentContent|}}}|[[Has comment text::{{{CommentContent|}}}]]}}
[[Category:Comment]]

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:CommentResult |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Used as result printer template. |long description=This template is used by Collaboration Extension to format the results of the query created by ShowComments template. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }}
{{#vardefine:userimage|{{#ask: [[{{{2}}}]] | ?User_image = | link=none}} }}{{#if:{{#var:userimage}}| [[{{#var:userimage}}|frameless|48px|nopreview|link={{{2}}}]] | [[File:Defaultuser.gif|frameless|48px|nopreview]] }}
{{#ifexist:{{{2|}}}|[[{{{2|}}}]]|{{{2|}}}}}
,Â 
{{{3}}}
{{#if:{{{6|}}}|, for article: [[{{{6}}}]]|}}
 [[{{{1}}}|show comment]]
{{#if:{{{5}}}|
{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} < 2 | {{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} > -2 | Article quality rated:
{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} = -1 | [[File:Bad_active.png|nopreview]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} = 0 | [[File:Neutral_active.png|nopreview]] }}{{#ifexpr: {{{5}}} = 1 | [[File:Good_active.png|nopreview]] }}
| }}| }}
| }}
{{{4}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:ShowComments |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Show all comments incl. form. |long description=This templates queries for all existing comments created by the Collaboration Extension. Afterwards it calls a parser function to get the comment form for creating new comment. |parameters=
{{ShowComments
|show=True}}
|Calls template=Template:ShowCommentsIntern }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#ifeq:{{{show|}}}|True|{{ShowCommentsIntern}}|}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:ShowCommentsIntern |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Show all comments incl. form. |long description=This templates queries for all existing comments created by the Collaboration Extension. Afterwards it calls a parser function to get the comment form for creating new comment. |parameters=
{{ShowCommentsIntern}}
|Calls template=Template:CommentResult }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#vardefine:avgrating|{{#ask: [[Belongs to article::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Has comment rating::+]][[Comment:+]] | ?Has comment rating | format=average }}}} {{#vardefine:countrating|{{#ask: [[Belongs to article::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Has comment rating::+]][[Comment:+]] | ?Has comment rating | format=count }}}}
{{#if:{{#var:avgrating}}|
[[File:Comment_icon_crystal.png|middle|nopreview|25px|link=]] Comments ({{#var:countrating}} people rated this
{{#ifexpr:{{#var:avgrating}} < -0.33 |[[File:Bad_active.png|nopreview|middle|link=]]}}{{#ifexpr:{{#var:avgrating}} >= -0.33| {{#ifexpr:{{#var:avgrating}} <= 0.33 |[[File:Neutral_active.png|nopreview|middle|link=]]}}}}{{#ifexpr:{{#var:avgrating}} > 0.33 |[[File:Good_active.png|nopreview|middle|link=]]}})
|}} {{#showcommentform:}} {{#ask: [[Belongs to article::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]] [[Comment:+]] | ?Has comment person | ?Has comment date | ?Has comment text | ?Has comment rating | format=template | template=CommentResult | link=none | limit=100 }}

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Has comment person |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Contains the commenting person. |long description=This property contains the person who has created the comment with the Collaboration Extension. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:String| ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Has comment text |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Contains a comment text. |long description=This porperty contains the comment text of a comment created by the Collaboration Extension. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:Text| ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Has rating |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=The rating value of a comment. |long description=This is used by the Collaboration Extension and contains the values of the individual ratings. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:Number| ]] [[Allows value::1| ]] [[Allows value::0| ]] [[Allows value::-1| ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Has comment date |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=The date of a comment. |long description=This property contains a datetime string of a comment created by the Collaboration Extension. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]][[has type::Type:Date| ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Belongs to article |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Property |rationale=Used to create a relation between comments and articles. |long description=This is used to create a relation between comments created by the Collaboration Extension and the articles that have been commented. }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[has type::Type:Page| ]][[Has max cardinality::1| ]][[Has min cardinality::1| ]][[has domain and range::Category:Comment; | ]]

|<noinclude> {{documentation}} <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls. </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Category |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a category. |long description=__NOTITLE__ You should use this template to provide your wiki-community with a proper documentation of the categories used in the wiki. |Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Category |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_category_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === This category is populated by the form: {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Page has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}}|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} }}[[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Category| ]] === Defined in templates === This category is used for category annotations in the templates: {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new template using this category by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateTemplate?category={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create template])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining template|link=none}}
}} {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|[[Category:Wiki part| ]]|}}[[Is category::true| ]]

|copyright holder=
}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Get value from list |Has author=WikiSysop2 |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is useful if you have a list of values separated by an arbitrary delimiter (e.g. ",") and you need a value at a particular position in the list. |long description=__NOTITLE__ This template is useful if you have a list of values separated by an arbitrary delimiter (e.g. ",") and you need a value at a particular position in the list. |parameters=
{{Get value from list
|list=a,b,c,d
|deliminiter=,
|pos=3
}}
}} Test: {{Get value from list|list=Template:A template|delimiter=:|pos=2}} Test2: {{Get value from list|list=Template:A template|delimiter=:|pos=1}} test3: {{#titleparts:{{#arraymap:Template:A template|:|x|x|/}}|1|1 }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True }} {{#titleparts:{{#arraymap:{{{list}}}|{{{delimiter}}}|x|x|/}}|1|{{{pos}}} }}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |long description=__NOTITLE__ |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|hints for templates and forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Template ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Short description|}}}|| {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=}} | {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Form=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}} width="10%" valign="left" align="center" rowspan="2" {{!}} [[{{{Icon}}}|40px]] {{!}} '''Semantic form ''{{{Pagetitle}}}'' ''' {{!}}}
{{!}}}
{{{!}} cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5" style="position:relative; margin: 0 0 0.5em 1em; border-collapse: collapse; border: 1px solid #999999; background: rgb(255,255,255); float: right; clear: none; width: 20em" {{#ifeq:{{{Thumbnail image|}}}||| {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=[[{{{Thumbnail image|}}}|150px]]}} }} {{!}}- {{Tablelongrow|Label=Overview:|Value=''{{{Short description}}}''}} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Wiki section|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Wiki section:|Value={{{Wiki section|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value=''main namespace''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Namespace:|Value={{{Has special namespace|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|| {{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value=''not specified...''}} |{{Tablerow|Label=Example:|Value={{{Example article|}}} }} }} {{!}}- {{Tablerow|Label=Author:|Value={{{author|}}} }} {{!}}} |Category=
{{{!}} width="100%" cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" align="center" {{!}}- {{!}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Show defining template |Has author=WikiSysop2 |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True }}
  • [[{{{1|}}}]] ''(you can replace this template by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateTemplate?category={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}}&template+name={{urlencode:{{Get value from list|list={{{1|}}}|delimiter=:|pos=2}}}} create new template])''

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Template |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to annotate any template in the wiki and to assign it to a content section in the wiki. |long description=__NOTITLE__Call this template whenever making a template accessible for other wiki users. It helps bookkeeping of the templates belonging to a particular wiki section. |Example article=Template:Person |parameters=
{{Template
|PAGENAME=Template:Header for content
|part of=SMWforum User Manuals Section
|rationale=This generates the green bar at the top of each article in the Help-section.
|parameters=
|hints for templates and forms=The parameter "depth" must be included unchanged (as given in the example above).
}}
|Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Template |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_template_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Thumbnail image={{#ifeq:{{{Form thumbnail|}}}|||[[Form thumbnail::{{{Form thumbnail|}}}]]}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} |Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Sample template call === {{#ifeq:{{{parameters|}}}||''not specified...''|{{{parameters|}}} }} === Defines categories === This template uses these categories in category annotations: {{#ifeq:{{{defines category|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{defines category|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Defines category::x]]|}}
}} === Interaction with other templates and forms === This template calls other templates: {{#ifeq:{{{Calls template|}}}||* none|
    {{#arraymap:{{{Calls template|}}}|,|x|
  • [[Calls template::x]]|}}
}} This template is called by: {{#ask:[[Calls template::{{{PAGENAME}}}]]|format=ul|default=* none}} This template is populated by form(s): {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new form populating this template by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateEmbeddedForm?for+template={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create form])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Form]][[Populates template::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining form|link=none}}
}} [[Category:Template]] [[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Template| ]] Edit the page to see the template text.

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Property |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Displays a property and some essential metadata. |long description=__NOTITLE__ }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Property |Icon=Image:smw_plus_property_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === New pages (i.e. "redlinks") which are related via this property shall use the form: *{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} [[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Property| ]] [[Category:Property]]
